content:
PlantingSpace | Remote | Full-time / flexible | https://planting.space

PlantingSpace is an early-stage research and development project. We aim to build a system capable of understanding knowledge, to answer questions and get things done. Our work makes heavy use of Applied Category Theory and Probabilistic Programming.

We are looking for researchers interested to apply their CT expertise, as well as software engineers!

See other positions (CT researcher position is not listed) and apply at https://planting.space/joinus
